sentences: In the decision (FCCC/SBSTA/2003/L.26/Add.1), the COP requests SBSTA-20 to initiate its work on scientific, technical and socioeconomic aspects of impacts of, and vulnerability and adaptation to, climate change, and on scientific, technical and socioeconomic aspects of mitigation, and to focus on exchanging information and sharing experiences and view among Parties on practical opportunities and solutions to facilitate the UNFCCCs implementation.
The COP also requests SBSTA to report on its work to COP-11.
enb_long_title: Ninth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
